fields.name: DetailedStatus
fields.description: The more detailed status of the console.

fields.name: DetailedStatusMessage
fields.description: The descriptive message about the current detailed status.

fields.name: Enabled
fields.description: The indicator of whether the console access is enabled.

fields.name: Expiration
fields.description: The date and time after which the key will be disallowed access.

fields.name: PrivateLinkServiceId
fields.description: The resource ID of the private link service that is used to provide virtual machine console access.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioning state of the virtual machine console.

fields.name: SshPublicKey
fields.description: The SSH public key that will be provisioned for user access. The user is expected to have the corresponding SSH private key for logging in.

fields.name: VirtualMachineAccessId
fields.description: The unique identifier for the virtual machine that is used to access the console.
